Look in `src/utils/test.js`. <!-- ✅ -->
Run `mycmd(arg1, arg2)` to start <!-- ✅ -->
Find details at https://example.com/path/to/file.js <!-- ✅ -->
Node.js is our runtime <!-- ✅ -->
We support React.js for UI <!-- ✅ -->
